text: is there a good way to take advantage of the lazy loading image field so that images fade in on load?

Hello! Does any of you may know what is project.js file and how to get rid of it?
One of my clients says it returns 403 error

Haven’t tried, but if you wanted to test out theory i’d go with some css transitions on this.  My idea would be to not use native lazy load, There are some old school javascript script that handle lazy loading — in that script when you replace, then you’d look to make your transition happen
